overview.overview: ownCloud provides access to your data through a web interface, sync clients or WebDAV while providing a platform to view, sync and share across devices easily-all under your control.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged ownCloud with professional support for your business. ownCloud is a self-hosted file sync and share server software. It provides access to your data through a web interface, sync clients or WebDAV while providing a platform to view, sync and share across devices easily-all under your control. ownCloud's open architecture is extensible for applications and plugins and it works with any storage.
